extendedInfo.description: Interesting game - puzzles with pictures of weapon.You have an image that is cut into small pieces, and you collect them in proper sequence. When passing levels image is divided into smaller and smaller pieces.Everyone knows the rules for collection of puzzles and they are so simple that even a child can handle this game.Also this application has nice built in music.The game has a lot of levels. You can compare your results with your friends!Play in Jigsaw Puzzles Game with images of weapon and just enjoy the game.On our page you will be able to find other topics to puzzles.Rate our app and leave your comments desired.
